game.name: Dirt Bike 2
game.description:
Dirt Bike 2 is also one of the most popular free online games for bikers. This cool racing game is simply a big threat to those who actually want to become a daring dirt bike rider.

Dirt bike racing game is a fun-filled and highly thrilling sports activity. Expert bike riders take the responsibility of controlling the bikes and please the watching spectators with the successful completion of each level of the game. In this closed circuit racing game, spectators have an opportunity to watch and enjoy every activity done by the riders.ï¿½

In Dirt Bike 2, you as a rider will have to beat different obstacles that come on your way with the proper balance of your bike in a set time frame. The best way to beat such obstacles is to ride the bike slowly while dealing with the hurdles of the track. If you choose to play this free online game, you would be amazed at the surprising moments that will unfold before your eyes.

Break out your bike towards the most difficult journey you have ever seen in your life and dig their wheels into some badass dirt tracks. Letï¿½take a chance to drive your new racing bike for boys over objects.ï¿½

Instructions: Accelerate - Up arrow key ? Reverse - Down arrow key ? Tilt backward/forwards - Left/right arrow keys respectively ? Brake - Ctrl key ? Turn ? Space
